Title: Relates to emergency assistance for the replacement of property as a result of a bedbug infestation
Summary: Relates to emergency assistance for the replacement of property as a result of a bedbug infestation; authorizes assistance in cases where the infestation cannot be controlled through the use of pesticides, treatments, fumigation, or any other method of extermination by an exterminator.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to emergency assistance for the replacement of property as a result of a bedbug infestation
